attributes.action: Make stronger and better laws for animals !!!!
attributes.background: Animal abuse is so common in the United Kingdom not just in the UK but worldwide,  help me to make a difference! No animal should have to go through any kind of cruelty. The UK needs  stronger laws for animal abuse, they pretty much get a slapped wrist ! They should be inprisoned indefinitely!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the law to be changed.
